reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Could improve on office hours availability.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Garcia is always willing to help. Great problem-solving skills.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages critical thinking and class discussions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Exams are much harder than homework assignments.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging storyteller. Makes history come alive. Could improve on feedback for essays.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes struggles to explain concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and interesting assignments. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and real-world examples. Heavy workload but worth it.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums were a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be biased in presentations. Encourage more diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with a focus on current environmental issues. Group projects were challenging but educational.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Incredibly thought-provoking. Encourages students to question assumptions and think critically.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and supportive. Clinical rotations were well-organized.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Outdated teaching methods. Needs to incorporate more current business trends.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes linguistics accessible and fun. Great at explaining complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but strict. Assignments are challenging, which is good for learning but stressful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Field work opportunity was a great experience.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional instructor. Patient, encouraging, and deeply knowledgeable about music.
